task.title: Including Necessary Information on Your Resume
task.shortdesc: It is important to make sure that you are including the proper information on your resume, and that you are not leaving anything out.

context.p: Including information on your resume such as your name, contact info, education, licenses and certifications, professional experience and skills is important.

steps.stepsection: To document your education, licenses/certifications and professional experience:

step.cmd: Include the most recent experience, degree or certification first.
Always include the year that you graduated or earned your certification.
If you graduated with a GPA that was above a 3.0, be sure to include it on your resume.
